ConnectionStrings.Comment: Using Supabase Connection Pooling (Session Pooler) for better reliability. Format: Host=aws-1-ap-south-1.pooler.supabase.com;Port=5432;Database=postgres;Username=postgres.xxxxx;Password=xxx;SSL Mode=Require;Timeout=30;
ConnectionStrings.Note: Connection Pooling is recommended for production. If you need direct connection, use AlternativeDirectConnection instead.

PLC.Comment: Set EnablePolling to true to automatically read from PLC and print bundles. Heartbeat monitoring reads DB1.DBW6 at the specified interval.

Printer.Comment: Honeywell PS45S printer for testing. For Telerik Reporting: Leave ReportTemplatePath empty to use programmatic report (mock Rpt_MillLabel), or specify path to .trdp/.trdx file. For Windows printer, set UseNetwork to false and Address to printer name.
